GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.12 to before v5.15.56
GSD.description:
icmp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_icmp_errors_use_inbound_ifaddr.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit de9490c32bc10020efdd1509689a28f197d6dfb8, it was introduced in version v2.6.12 by commit 1c2fb7f93cb20621772bf304f3dba0849942e5db. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: icmp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_icmp_errors_use_inbound_ifaddr.
